arStrings.szText: {c_highlight}Realmwalkers{/c} spread Mephisto's hatred throughout the land. Slay them to open a {c_highlight}Seething Realm{/c}.
Delve into the portal and complete the dungeon to earn {c_highlight}Seething Opals{/c}.
Consume a {c_highlight}Seething Opal{/c} for a bonus to experience gain and treasure drops in all activities.

Earn favor with the {c_highlight}Zakarum Remnants{/c} by battling {c_highlight}Realmwalkers{/c}, slaying monsters in {c_highlight}Seething Realms{/c}, or slaying monsters anywhere with a {c_highlight}Seething Opal{/c} effect.
